dia.str: I brought you ingredients, Ivo. It's some kind of plant.

'Ivo carefully smells and tastes each and every ingredient he thinks might be interesting. He closes his eyes and breathes deeply.' I think we have something here, young man. This dried plant is extraordinary. I will certainly try it. Where did you find it?
I don't remember but somewhere around here.

Thank you for your help. Here take a bottle of my oldest spirit. You earned it. And let me tell you a secret of my trade. The secret is to age the spirit in these special casks you see around here. And the bigger secret is that the one I give the rebels is only aged for a few weeks. The bloody idiots are not sophisticated enough to taste the difference. I have to add some color to the product because to get this wonderful dark red color one has to age the spirit for years. One day I will try to give them one without added color. They might be stupid enough not to notice.
